title: Overhead electric supply lines, if any, including space for electrical transformer / substation acco
clause_text: Overhead electric supply lines, if any, including space for electrical transformer / substation according to these Regulations or as per the requirements of the electric distribution company; Any water course existing on site or adjacent to site; Existing alignments of water supply and drainage lines; Such other particulars as may be prescribed by the Authority.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
